data.name: Gremlins, Inc. – Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This original soundtrack contains 27 themes created by A. Fruit specifically for Gremlins, Inc. (including one bonus track that is not available anywhere in the game). A. Fruit comes from the background of producing bass music, with her tracks commercially released in compilations in USA, UK, Japan, Russia, Poland and Argentina. She is based in Moscow and frequently performs as a DJ in Russian and European music clubs.

The collaboration between Charlie Oscar and A. Fruit started in Vilnius in the summer of 2015. Throughout the following years, A. Fruit created over 300 custom sound effects and 27 original music tracks. In her own words: "this album is mostly experimental stuff made with the sounds of old clocks and other mechanic noises I've recorded. Being composed with vintage instruments and mixed with the interface sounds of the game, it reminds of the electroswing and the hip-hop music, but with the atmosphere of an industrial steampunk town."

SIDE A (main themes, re-mastered)
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

1. Gremlins, Inc.
2. The Winner
3. Better Luck Next Time
4. Uninvited Guests
5. Mechanical Competitors
6. Astral Gamblers
7. See You Around (​bonus track)
8. The Abandoned Clockwork Town
9. Festive Tune
10. Melody of the Automated Rooster
11. Gremlins vs Automatons Theme
12. The Sound of Spring
13. Astral Holiday
14. Rusty Melody
15. Mastermind's Tune

SIDE B (ambient themes, re-mastered)
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

1. The Clockwork Town
2. The Astral Plane
3. The Bank
4. The Treasure
5. The Court
6. The Casino
7. The Inferno
8. The Jail
9. The Marketplace
10. The Dump
11. The Plant
12. The Office

Total playtime: 62:16. MP3 320, FLAC.

Please note that the tracks will be placed in the folder corresponding to Gremlins, Inc.: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Gremlins_Inc.

data.short_description: This original soundtrack contains 24 themes created by A. Fruit specifically for Gremlins, Inc. (including one bonus track that is not available anywhere else in the game). SIDE A features 12 re-mastered main themes. SIDE B features 12 re-mastered ambient themes. Total playtime: 62:16.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Ukrainian, Italian, Czech, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: internal
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: internal
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: internal
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: internal

data.legal_notice: Gremlins, Inc. (c) 2013-2018 Alexey Bokulev and Sergei Klimov. Developed by Charlie Oscar Lima Tango Interactive Entertainment UAB (Vilnius, Lithuania). All rights reserved. Published internationally by The Merchant Guild of Rund (Limited). For full list of collaborators, please refer to in-game credits. All hail the gremlin Governor!
